languages.text: "Я слишком долго убегала, {name}. Пряталась за чужими спинами, пока мой дом, мою семью... разрывали изнутри ненависть и междоусобицы. Да и что могла сделать юная, неопытная девушка тем, кто так отчаянно старался или сгубить меня, или подчинить своей воле?"

"I have been running for too long, {name}. Hiding behind others while my home, my family... were being torn apart by hatred and strife. And what could a young, inexperienced girl do to those who were so desperate to either destroy me or bend me to their will?"
languages.original_text: "Я слишком долго убегала, {name}. Пряталась за чужими спинами, пока мой дом, мою семью... разрывали изнутри ненависть и междоусобицы. Да и что могла сделать юная, неопытная девушка тем, кто так отчаянно старался или сгубить меня, или подчинить своей воле?"

traits.locale_text: "I have been running for too long, {name}. Hiding behind other people's backs while my home, my family.... were being torn apart by hatred and strife. And what could a young, inexperienced girl do to those who were so desperate to either destroy me or bend me to their will?"

"I have been running for too long, {name}. Hiding behind other people's backs while my home, my family.... were being torn apart by hatred and strife. And what could a young, inexperienced girl do to those who were so desperate to either destroy me or bend me to their will?"

"I have been running for too long, {name}. Hiding behind others while my home, my family.... were being torn apart by hatred and strife. And what could a young, inexperienced girl do to those who were so desperate to either destroy me or bend me to their will?"

"I have been running for too long, {name}. Hiding behind others while my home, my family.... were being torn apart by hatred and strife. And what could a young, inexperienced girl do to those who were so desperate to either destroy me or bend me to their will?"

"I have been running for too long, {name}. Hiding behind others while my home, my family... were being torn apart by hatred and strife. And what could a young, inexperienced girl do to those who were so desperate to either destroy me or bend me to their will?"

languages.text: “我已经逃了太久了，{name}。我一直躲在别人后面，可我的家族，我的家人……正由于仇恨与冲突变得四分五裂。那些人要么不顾一切想要杀了我，要么打算迫使我屈从于他们的意愿。我这个没有经验的年轻姑娘，又能做些什么呢？”
languages.original_text: "I have been running for too long, {name}. Hiding behind others while my home, my family... were being torn apart by hatred and strife. And what could a young, inexperienced girl do to those who were so desperate to either destroy me or bend me to their will?"

traits.locale_text: “我已经逃了太久了，{name}。我一直躲在别人后面，可我的家族，我的家人……正由于仇恨与冲突变得四分五裂。那些人要么不顾一切想要杀了我，要么打算迫使我屈从于他们的意愿。我这个没有经验的年轻姑娘，又能做些什么呢？”

languages.text: «Llevo demasiado tiempo huyendo, {name}. Ocultándome detrás de los demás mientras mi hogar, mi familia... se desgarraban entre el odio y las disputas. ¿Y qué podía hacer una niña joven e inmadura frente a aquellos que estaban desesperados por destruirme o doblegarme a su voluntad?».
languages.original_text: "I have been running for too long, {name}. Hiding behind others while my home, my family... were being torn apart by hatred and strife. And what could a young, inexperienced girl do to those who were so desperate to either destroy me or bend me to their will?"

traits.locale_text: «Llevo demasiado tiempo huyendo, {name}. Ocultándome detrás de los demás mientras mi hogar, mi familia... se desgarraban entre el odio y las disputas. ¿Y qué podía hacer una niña joven e inmadura frente a aquellos que estaban desesperados por destruirme o doblegarme a su voluntad?».

languages.text: 「{name}様、あたくしはこれまであまりにも長い間、逃げ続けてまいりました。自分の生まれ故郷、家族が…憎しみと争いによって引き裂かれている間も、ずっと他人の背後に隠れてきたのです。破滅させるか意のままに操ろうと躍起になっている奴らに、年端もゆかぬ経験も浅い少女に何ができるというのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "I have been running for too long, {name}. Hiding behind others while my home, my family... were being torn apart by hatred and strife. And what could a young, inexperienced girl do to those who were so desperate to either destroy me or bend me to their will?"

traits.locale_text: 「{name}様、あたくしはこれまであまりにも長い間、逃げ続けてまいりました。自分の生まれ故郷、家族が…憎しみと争いによって引き裂かれている間も、ずっと他人の背後に隠れてきたのです。破滅させるか意のままに操ろうと躍起になっている奴らに、年端もゆかぬ経験も浅い少女に何ができるというのでしょう？」

languages.text: "Ich bin schon zu lange auf der Flucht, {name}. Habe mich hinter anderen versteckt, während mein Zuhause, meine Familie ... von Hass und Zwietracht zerrissen wurden. Und was könnte ein junges, unerfahrenes Mädchen schon groß ausrichten gegen jene, die mich entweder vernichten oder ihrem Willen beugen wollten?"
languages.original_text: "I have been running for too long, {name}. Hiding behind others while my home, my family... were being torn apart by hatred and strife. And what could a young, inexperienced girl do to those who were so desperate to either destroy me or bend me to their will?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin schon zu lange auf der Flucht, {name}. Habe mich hinter anderen versteckt, während mein Zuhause, meine Familie ... von Hass und Zwietracht zerrissen wurden. Und was könnte ein junges, unerfahrenes Mädchen schon groß ausrichten gegen jene, die mich entweder vernichten oder ihrem Willen beugen wollten?"

languages.text: « Depuis trop longtemps, je passe ma vie à fuir, {name}. À me cacher derrière les autres alors que mon foyer et ma famille sont déchirés par la haine et le conflit. Et qu'aurait pu faire une jeune femme inexpérimentée contre ceux qui cherchaient si ardemment à la détruire ou à la réduire en servitude ? »
languages.original_text: "I have been running for too long, {name}. Hiding behind others while my home, my family... were being torn apart by hatred and strife. And what could a young, inexperienced girl do to those who were so desperate to either destroy me or bend me to their will?"

traits.locale_text: « Depuis trop longtemps, je passe ma vie à fuir, {name}. À me cacher derrière les autres alors que mon foyer et ma famille sont déchirés par la haine et le conflit. Et qu'aurait pu faire une jeune femme inexpérimentée contre ceux qui cherchaient si ardemment à la détruire ou à la réduire en servitude ? »

languages.text: "Çok uzun zamandır kaçıyorum {name}. Evim, ailem... Nefret ve çatışma sebebiyle paramparça olurken başkalarının arkasına saklanıyorum. Beni yok etmek veya bana kendi arzularıyla diz çökmek için fazlasıyla istekli olan buncasına karşı genç, deneyimsiz bir kız ne yapabilir ki?"
languages.original_text: "I have been running for too long, {name}. Hiding behind others while my home, my family... were being torn apart by hatred and strife. And what could a young, inexperienced girl do to those who were so desperate to either destroy me or bend me to their will?"
